revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ViewSonic |model=WPG-370 |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=01/28/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability= |type=video streamer, computer screen streamer |fcc_id=GSS-VS15180 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTD1185P |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=CC&C WL-6210-V3 |wi1_module_if=USB 2.0 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192DU |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=VGA out, HDMI out, SPDIF out, WiDi |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.59.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} *"NTV310 Rev:C" and "FKX-4" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A label affixed to the board has "NTV310" printed on it (among other things). :"10G030700-0C" and "DATE:" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
The [[Realtek]] SoC used appears to be RTD1185P ([http://www.realtek.com.tw/products/productsView.aspx?Langid=1&PFid=29&Level=3&Conn=2&ProdID=286 ''RTD1185'' on '''Realtek''' site]).
This device has two USB 2.0 ports.. but one is used internally :for the wireless module.
*Per the FCC manual (potentially inaccurate), the web configuration :interface can be reached at ''192.168.59.254/remote/admin.html'' . :The manual also specifies the default SSID as ''WPG-370''.
